title: History of Ancient Civilizations
description: Explore the rise and fall of ancient civilizations, focusing on their social, economic, and political structures. This assignment is out of a total of 100 marks.

title: Chemistry Lab Report
description: Conduct a series of chemical experiments in your own lab setup or virtually. This assignment is out of a total of 100 marks.

title: Literary Analysis - The Great Gatsby
description: Analyze F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and write a literary analysis essay. This assignment is out of a total of 100 marks.

title: Mathematics Problem Set - Calculus II
description: Solve a series of challenging calculus problems that cover integration, differentiation, and applications. This assignment is out of a total of 100 marks.

title: Biology Research Project - Ecology
description: Conduct a research project on an ecological topic of your choice. This assignment is out of a total of 100 marks.
